com.cognifide.slice.persistence.api.serializer

Interface ObjectSerializer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnumPropertySerializer, NativeArraySerializer, NativePropertySerializer, RecursiveSerializer

    @ConsumerType
public interface ObjectSerializer
extends Serializer
    Serializes an object into resource. Unlike the FieldSerializer it doesn't have access to the field information.
    Since:
    4.3
